enGB:
The ease with which you dispatch their companion strikes fear into the hearts of your opponents.
Benefit: Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 or fewer {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, you can make a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (to intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize all enemies within 30 feet as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Enemies that cannot see both you and the enemy you reduced to 0 or fewer hit points are unaffected.

As you slowly disable your oppoent with clinical precision their spirit begins to crumble.
Benefit: When you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an opponent with a Piranha Strike, you may make an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} to attempt to demoralize your opponent.
